duties_responsibilities.duty: Showcasing the store's point of difference as the food authority by offering unique food preparation solutions to customers.
Being the "Ambassador of the Aisle" promoting products and engaging customers through interaction, demonstrations, tastings, and events.
Providing product knowledge, preparation and presentation guidance, and unique recipe suggestions to customers.
Serving as the point person for company-wide and individual store events.
Collaborating with department managers and agency demonstrators on demo planning, promotion, and execution.

education_certification.credential: Experience or training in culinary arts, food preparation, food instruction, and meal and event planning.
